reviewText: My son love it thank you so much .my son autism God bless you

It was for my daughter who is now 15, she loved this show when she was younger so for her birthday I thought it could be neat to get her something from her childhood, by the oh my gosh excitement I knew I had done well, she loved it, she shared it with a friend who also loved the show as a kid, she watches it at least once a week to bring back that smile from back when. It arrived quickly and was perfect, need to get more for her keepsake box .
We love Maggie & the Ferocious Beast.  Maggie is sweet and patient. All of the stories have a lesson.  Very educational.

My daughter LOVES this DVD.

I think it would also be helpful for the elementary school aged child who is losing "baby teeth" and self-conscious.  After all, that's the point of the Beast's "funny face"- his missing tooth!
